transparency.description:
No matter what industry you are in, if your organisation consumes electricity, we can help you measure your impact.

Sign up for our beta to so we can work together to produce a sustainability dashboard for your organisation.
transparency.title: Create your own dashboard

costSavings.description:
Leverage our API for intelligent decision-making with carbon-signals in your network and devices

Easily optimise to help reach your sustainability targets.
costSavings.title: Access Carbon Crowd API

regulationCompliance.description:
We offer bespoke consulting to help you achieve your decarbonisation targets and meet upcoming regulation.

Work with Carbon Crowd to measure and decarbonise your digital footprint.
regulationCompliance.title: Bespoke consulting solutions

followUs.title: Follow us!
followUs.twitter: Follow us on Twitter and get our latest updates!

about.realTimeCarbonAnalytics: Real-time carbon analytics for cloud networks
about.subtitle: Real-time carbon analytics for Cloud Networks, Blockchain and IoT
about.title: Decarbonise cloud computing.

vision.description: "We are on a mission to decarbonise the digital economy by providing real-time carbon analytics for cloud networks, blockchains and IoT devices. This data can be used to understand the source, amount and carbon intensity of the electricity consumed by a device or network of devices."
vision.author: Hamish Hutchings, CTO, Carbon Crowd
vision.title: What we stand for

contacts.joinOurSocials: Join our socials or schedule a call
contacts.title: Speak To Us

greenEnergy.description: What does a Renewable Energy Purchase means for you, and the network?

enhancedReputation.description: Show your community and stakeholders that you're committed to responsible and ethical practices.
enhancedReputation.title: Enhanced Reputation

environmentalLeadership.description: By purchasing renewable energy, you directly contribute to reducing carbon emissions of the entire IC network.
environmentalLeadership.title: Environmental Leadership

globalImpact.description: Contribute to the global effort to combat climate change, fostering a cleaner and healthier planet for generations to come.
globalImpact.title: Global Impact

regulatoryCompliance.description: Ensure your operations align seamlessly with evolving standards, demonstrating a commitment to responsible practices.
regulatoryCompliance.title: Regulatory Compliance

greenEnergy.title: Green Energy

additionality.description: Carbon Credits are a good way to compensate for historical emissions, but decarbonization (preventing emissions) should always be the priority.
additionality.title: Additionality

addToken.description: We’ll add any tokenized carbon available on the IC  to the platform. If you want to discuss and integration then speak to us.
addToken.title: Add a token

other.description: Used high-quality offsets, or made another environmental commitment? Use the form below to let us know about it.

renewableEnergyPurchases.description: Already run in a fully green data centre, or have purchased renewable energy from a different providers? Use the form be provide us with the information we  need to update the dashboard.
